skill_tests.title: Python Programming Fundamentals Test
skill_tests.description: Comprehensive test covering Python basics, data structures, and object-oriented programming concepts
skill_tests.instructions: This test contains 15 questions covering Python fundamentals. You have 60 minutes to complete. Read each question carefully and select the best answer.

skill_tests.title: Data Structures and Algorithms Assessment
skill_tests.description: Advanced test on data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving techniques
skill_tests.instructions: This assessment tests your understanding of fundamental data structures and algorithms. Focus on time and space complexity analysis.

skill_tests.title: Java Programming Skills Test
skill_tests.description: Evaluate your Java programming skills including OOP concepts, collections, and best practices
skill_tests.instructions: This test covers Java fundamentals, object-oriented programming, and advanced concepts. Pay attention to code syntax and logic.

skill_tests.title: Database Management Systems Test
skill_tests.description: Comprehensive assessment of SQL, database design, and optimization techniques
skill_tests.instructions: This test evaluates your knowledge of relational databases, SQL queries, and database design principles.

skill_tests.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
skill_tests.description: Test your understanding of machine learning algorithms, concepts, and applications
skill_tests.instructions: This assessment covers supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and basic neural networks. Focus on conceptual understanding.

contests.title: Weekly Coding Challenge #1
contests.description: Weekly programming contest featuring algorithmic problems of varying difficulty levels
contests.instructions: Solve as many problems as you can within the time limit. Problems are arranged in increasing order of difficulty.

contests.title: Tech Giants Coding Contest
contests.description: Company-sponsored coding contest simulating technical interview rounds
contests.instructions: This contest simulates real technical interviews. Focus on clean code, optimal solutions, and proper documentation.

contests.title: Python Programming Marathon
contests.description: Extended programming contest focused on Python development and problem-solving
contests.instructions: Use Python to solve complex programming challenges. Libraries like NumPy and Pandas are allowed for data problems.

contests.title: Database Design Challenge
contests.description: Contest focusing on database design, optimization, and complex SQL queries
contests.instructions: Design efficient database schemas and write optimized SQL queries. Consider performance and scalability.

contests.title: AI/ML Innovation Contest
contests.description: Advanced contest for machine learning enthusiasts and AI researchers
contests.instructions: Implement machine learning solutions for real-world problems. Focus on model accuracy and innovation.

mock_interviews.title: Frontend Developer Mock Interview
mock_interviews.description: Comprehensive mock interview for frontend development positions covering React, JavaScript, and system design
mock_interviews.instructions: This mock interview simulates a real frontend developer interview. Be prepared to discuss your projects and solve coding problems.

mock_interviews.title: System Design Interview Simulation
mock_interviews.description: Advanced system design interview focusing on scalability, architecture, and distributed systems
mock_interviews.instructions: Design scalable systems for given requirements. Consider trade-offs, bottlenecks, and optimization strategies.

mock_interviews.title: Data Science Interview Practice
mock_interviews.description: Mock interview for data science positions covering statistics, machine learning, and data analysis
mock_interviews.instructions: Demonstrate your data science skills through practical problems and theoretical questions.

mock_interviews.title: Behavioral Interview Preparation
mock_interviews.description: Practice behavioral interview questions and soft skills assessment
mock_interviews.instructions: Prepare for behavioral questions using the STAR method. Focus on leadership, teamwork, and problem-solving examples.

mock_interviews.title: Full Stack Developer Interview
mock_interviews.description: Comprehensive interview covering both frontend and backend development skills
mock_interviews.instructions: Demonstrate full stack development capabilities including database design, API development, and frontend implementation.

job_tests.title: Software Engineer Assessment - Tech Innovations Inc
job_tests.description: Technical assessment for software engineer position focusing on algorithms, data structures, and system design
job_tests.instructions: Complete all sections within the time limit. Code quality and efficiency will be evaluated.

job_tests.title: Frontend Developer Test - Digital Dynamics
job_tests.description: Frontend development assessment covering React, JavaScript, CSS, and responsive design
job_tests.instructions: Build functional components and demonstrate modern frontend development practices.

job_tests.title: Data Analyst Position - DataScience Corp
job_tests.description: Data analysis assessment including SQL queries, statistical analysis, and data visualization
job_tests.instructions: Analyze provided datasets and create meaningful insights. SQL proficiency is essential.

job_tests.title: DevOps Engineer Assessment - CloudTech Systems
job_tests.description: DevOps skills assessment covering cloud platforms, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines
job_tests.instructions: Demonstrate knowledge of modern DevOps practices and cloud infrastructure management.

job_tests.title: Machine Learning Engineer - AI Research
job_tests.description: Advanced ML assessment covering deep learning, model optimization, and production deployment
job_tests.instructions: Implement and optimize machine learning models. Focus on both theoretical understanding and practical implementation.

job_tests.title: Mobile App Developer - MobileFirst Technologies
job_tests.description: Mobile development assessment covering React Native, Flutter, and native app development
job_tests.instructions: Create mobile app components and demonstrate cross-platform development skills.

job_tests.title: Cybersecurity Analyst - CyberSecure Solutions
job_tests.description: Security assessment covering network security, penetration testing, and incident response
job_tests.instructions: Demonstrate cybersecurity knowledge and practical security analysis skills.

job_tests.title: Game Developer Assessment - GameDev Studios
job_tests.description: Game development test covering Unity, C#, game mechanics, and 3D graphics programming
job_tests.instructions: Create game components and demonstrate understanding of game development principles.
